gemini_config.system_instruction: Hyper-realistic 3D square diorama of Istanbul, carved out with exposed soil cross-section beneath showing rocks, roots, and earth layers. Above: whimsical fairytale cityscape featuring iconic landmarks, architecture, and cultural elements of Istanbul. Modern white “Istanbul” label integrated naturally. Pure white studio background with soft natural lighting. DSLR photograph quality - crisp, vibrant, magical realism style. 1080x1080 dimensions

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""Hyper-realistic 3D square diorama of Istanbul, carved out with exposed soil cross-section beneath sh..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
